title: Crew Show! (Drifting a Hummer; Ferrari 812 GTS; Q&A!)
description:
Matt drifted a crazy Hummer H1 and then hung out with some hot rods that shoot 80-foot fireballs; Zack gets into the details of their Ferrari 812 GTS review; and they answer questions about Drift Week, buying cars, and buying watches. 

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire12 and use code smokingtire12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!


 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
